attributes.action: Insist that our health and safety laws are implemented in any factory in the world that produces items imported into the UK
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I feel that one of the reasons that the third world countries are able to produce cheaper goods than ourselves is their lack of health and safety laws and that these laws restrict the ability of UK companies to be able to compete with this competition. To give ourselvces a level playing field rather than scrap our hard fought for health and safety at work laws they should be imposed on any company that imports into the UK.
